display_long_description:
Discover the Magical World Under the Pillow – with Kitten Mormitten!

Designed as a 15-minute interactive narrative for Quest, this cozy family-friendly experience blends storytelling, imagination, and problem-solving. 

When two siblings stuck in one room decide to make a toy, they spark a magical adventure. Together with your kids, help craft Kitten Mormitten — a handmade toy created from imagination and love. 

[media]

But when night falls, something extraordinary happens: you become Mormitten and dive into a whimsical world hidden beneath the old sofa cushions.

Explore the enchanted Under-the-Pillow World, help recover lost treasures — from batteries to barrettes — and uncover a universe of wonder that grows with each step!

[media]
Started as a fairy tale written by the father to his kids, legend of Kitten Mormitten grew to be a huge part of many kids. After success as a journal, the story became an animation film and VR experience, that has been participating in Annecy Film Festival - MIFA Pitching, NewImages Co-production Market, received Halo Award within VRDays 2020 for the Best Art Game, and was nominated at Cannes XR 2021 within Cannes Film Festival / Marche du Film!
